description: From spice +â€Ž -ful.  According to the Poly-Olbion project, coined by  Michael Drayton in 1612.

adjectives.description: spiceful (comparative more spiceful, superlative most spiceful)

entries.meaning: Full or laden with spice; spicy; aromatic
examples: That those proud Airies, bred whereas the scorching skie
Doth sindge the sandie Wyldes of spicefull Barbarie;
